text: Klarobelia megalocarpa is a species of flowering plants in the family Annonaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.Muriel, P. & Pitman, N. 2003. Klarobelia megalocarpa. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 2003. Downloaded on 28 September 2015. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador megalocarpa Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Klarobelia megalocarpa
